regen.absent_element: action for handling errors that cannot be repaired
regen.new_specification: The system shall log and notify operators of computation errors that cannot be automatically repaired.

regen.absent_element: Notification or Alert for Compute Errors
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify or alert the operator when computation errors exceed tolerance levels.

regen.absent_element: notification or alert mechanism for Compute Errors
regen.new_specification: The system shall report all computation errors that cannot be repaired to the operator or administrator.

label: Report all out of tolerance conditions when monitoring Compute Errors.
absence: action of reporting when monitoring Compute Errors
